name: mgc-ado-tracker
description: Track Azure DevOps work items with AI-powered tagging and intelligent search.

tools.name: create_work_item
tools.description: Create a new work item in Azure DevOps and track it locally with AI-generated tags

tools.name: search_work_items
tools.description: Search tracked work items using natural language, tags, or filters

tools.name: get_work_item
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific work item

tools.name: sync_ado
tools.description: Sync work items from Azure DevOps to local tracker

tools.name: get_sync_status
tools.description: Get current sync status and last sync information

tools.name: list_tags
tools.description: List all available tags with usage counts

tools.name: launch_dashboard
tools.description: Get the URL for the MGC ADO Tracker web dashboard

ADO_ORG_URL.title: Azure DevOps Organization URL
ADO_ORG_URL.description: Your Azure DevOps organization URL (e.g., https://dev.azure.com/your-org)

ADO_PAT.title: Azure DevOps Personal Access Token
ADO_PAT.description: Personal Access Token with Work Items (Read & Write) permissions

SYNC_ENABLED.title: Enable Background Sync
SYNC_ENABLED.description: Enable automatic background sync with Azure DevOps

SYNC_INTERVAL_MINUTES.title: Sync Interval (minutes)
SYNC_INTERVAL_MINUTES.description: Sync frequency in minutes (only used if SYNC_ENABLED is true)

AUTO_TAG_NEW_ITEMS.title: Auto-tag New Items
AUTO_TAG_NEW_ITEMS.description: Automatically generate AI tags for synced work items

TAG_CONFIDENCE_THRESHOLD.title: Tag Confidence Threshold
TAG_CONFIDENCE_THRESHOLD.description: Minimum confidence score for auto-generated tags (0.0 to 1.0)
